568380.name: Motorsport Manager - Create Your Own Team
568380.description:
Customise your team name, colours and livery – take control of your own team!

You've felt the pressure of joining a team that has high ambitions and an ever-watching Chairman breathing down your neck. You've felt the pressure of the team and the fans looking to you to take them forward. Now it's time for you to take on the ultimate challenge of starting your own team from nothing. With your name above the door, your reputation is on the line.

Can you prove yourself to be the best?
568380.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 荷兰语, 匈牙利语
